document.discussion_title: This Time, It's Personal: How to Use Personalized Automation
document.topic_text: Send me more free small business tips like this This Time, It’s Personal Resources • Apr 05, 2016 20 tips for sending automated emails without sounding like a robot Sending automated emails and using automation software doesn’t make you a robot. It helps you respond quickly to inquiries, introduce your company to newcomers, and consistently communicate with prospects over weeks or months to nurture a lead into a sale. And automation can actually make emails feel more personal, as software ensures that you send the right message to the right customer at the right time, every time. In this e-book, you’ll learn: Tips to make your automated emails sound personal How to use merge fields When to send automated emails And more!
